attributes.action: change the law so sentences for convicted criminals run consecutively and not concurrently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: criminals always get shorter sentences because when sentenced for multiple crimes the sentence runs concurrently. If the sentences were to run consecutivly they would spend more time in prison before coming up for parole. This  would give victims a sense of justice and may make the criminals think twice.
